ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Forgot to answer this. Our guild has been down to right outside Trak s lair. Those shrooms guard the caves down there, along with Sebilite Protectors and
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, May 25/00, Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:

>... Anyone know? Anyone been to the lower
> levels in Seb?
>

Forgot to answer this. Our guild has been down to right outside Trak's
lair. Those shrooms guard the caves down there, along with Sebilite
Protectors and some very high level frogs. There's no way in hell they
should be agroing up by the bridge area.

SPOILER BELOW.

































if you jump off the first bridge you hit on the way in and swim down to
the end of the right side water area, you can swim down a tunnel that
takes you to a jail filled with high level frogs. There's a passage down
there that will take you into the cave area and on to Trak's lair. I
wouldn't advise trying this without a high level multi group party, and
we haven't done it since the patch so it may be even harder with the
random mob warping we are seeing now.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
